# ggINLA

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ggINLA is to provide a collection of functions to help visualize INLA models in ggplot2.

## Installation

The package is not available on CRAN, but you can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("emmaSkarstein/ggINLA")
```

## basic example code
